scripts.build: npm run build:plugin-desktop && npm run build:ashfox
scripts.test:practical: npm --workspace @ashfox/runtime run test:practical && npm --workspace @ashfox/conformance run test:practical
scripts.test: npm run runtime:check:node && npm run typecheck && npm run test:unit && npm run test:conformance && npm run test:gateway && npm run test:web && npm run test:worker
